ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: OT - Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: I play on two W2K systems, my home PC (Server) and my work notebook (Pro). I have one nagging EQ problem that recently surfaced with the SB Live! card. I ve
ygData.messageBody:
I play on two W2K systems, my home PC (Server) and my work notebook (Pro).
I have one nagging EQ problem that recently surfaced with the SB Live!
card. I've reloaded it so many times I think it might be an interupt
problem. I also have seen a strange "out of virtual memory...automatically
increasing resources..." message every time I play. These only occur on
the SB system and only With EQ.

Anyway, the systems are rock solid and now work great with my iDSL
connection (was too far for ADSL). I just have to shut down EQ with Task
Mgr or reboot :(.

Tzeetch on Xegony

--- Brett Keown <brettke@...> wrote:

I run W2K and it is great :) not only do I have great performance from<BR>
the game, but I have a great platform to work from when not gaming
that<BR>
is solid as a rock.  (Note:  I am a "little" biased)

I too had lots of problems with Windows ME as an upgrade to an<BR>
older box. (that box I updated to W2K Server and it runs great) I
received ME on a new box and have never had a single problem with it.
Kendawen Sournotes
34 Bard - E'ci
